content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. I understand you need plumbing assistance. Could I please have your name to get started?
Hi, it's Mike Thompson. I've been trying to get my kitchen sink fixed. It's leaking badly and honestly, getting on my nerves.
Thanks, Mike. Can you please provide your address so I can check our service availability and prepare for the visit?
Sure, I live at 1234 Maple Drive, Springfield.
Thanks for that. Let me confirm that we cover your area.
We do cover your area, Mike. When would be a convenient time for one of our plumbers to come by?
I've been waiting on this for days, so the sooner the better. How about tomorrow morning?
Checking availability for tomorrow morning now.
Good news, Mike! We have an opening tomorrow morning between 9 and 11 AM. Should I book you for that slot?
Yes, please book it. But can you tell me briefly what this will cost? I'm on a tight budget.

I understand your concern. For a kitchen sink leak repair, prices typically range from $75 to $150 depending on the complexity. Exact pricing will be confirmed after our plumber assesses the situation. I'll proceed with booking your appointment now.

Your appointment is scheduled for tomorrow between 9 and 11 AM. We'll send you a reminder before the visit. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services, Mike! If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out.
